rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Yup, that is definitely one busted probe.
Hang tight while I run a diagnostic and see what I can do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0002
rows.name: And that...should...do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0003
rows.name: All set. Sorry for the wait.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0004
rows.name: Well done, as always.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0005
rows.name: All in a day's work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0006
rows.name: One thing:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0007
rows.name:
The problem we had here wasn't unique—
it's bound to affect the other probes, sooner or later.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0008
rows.name: We probably should patch 'em all, to be safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0009
rows.name: Is Linly serious?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0010
rows.name: Friends want to go stitch up EVERY probe on all of Mira?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0011
rows.name: Tatsu will be grampypon before friends finish![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Simmer down, potato skin—it's not that bad.
I fixed this one manually,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0013
rows.name:
but now I can upload that patch and fix
all the other probes throughout the network at once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0014
rows.name: Whew! Whatever Linly talking about, Tatsu believe her![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0015
rows.name: Tatsu do Dance of Relief not to fix soooooo many probes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0016
rows.name: Yeah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0017
rows.name:
We have planted a lot of them, haven't we?
And really, what's it gotten us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0018
rows.name: Hmmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0019
rows.name: Not just us, everyone—all of BLADE. All of NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0020
rows.name:
We spent all this time on FrontierNav, you know?
What if we never find the core?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0021
rows.name: Then what do we do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0023
rows.name:
We've searched all over this planet looking for
the Lifehold Core—what if it's not even here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0024
rows.name:
What if...the whole thing smashed to bits
when it crashed down?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0025
rows.name: You know that's not possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0026
rows.name: Do I?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0027
rows.name:
Our consciousnesses aren't here—
they're controlling these mims remotely from the core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0028
rows.name: It can't have been destroyed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0029
rows.name:
In fact, it has to be somewhere relatively close,
or we would feel the lag.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0030
rows.name: You're right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0030_2
rows.name: I...just...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0031
rows.name:
It's okay, Lin. I know you're tired.
It's been a long couple of months.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0032
rows.name:
Being inside these mims takes its toll on all of us—
it's only natural to feel like this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0033
rows.name: But I promise—it's going to be all right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0034
rows.name:
What were they thinking when they
designed these things anyway...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0035
rows.name: Hmm? What Linly mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0036
rows.name:
These mims—why would you make an
artificial body that can cry tears?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0037
rows.name: So embarrassing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0038
rows.name: Well, lots of reasons. Tears lubricate the eyes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0039
rows.name: They flush out dust and debris...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0040
rows.name: And unwanted feelings, too. You feel better, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0041
rows.name: I guess those mim makers knew what they were doing after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0042
rows.name: Well, if I ever see them, I'll be sure to tell them you said so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0043
rows.name: Thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0044
rows.name: Hmm? ...Friends hear that?[ST:wait ]
